user.title: Configure Weather Based Heating Sensor
user.description: Select sensors for calculating the target heat carrier temperature.

data_description.wda_room_temp_correction: For every 1°C difference between the desired and actual indoor temperature, the heating system temperature is adjusted by this value.
data_description.wda_wind_correction: For every 1 m/s wind speed, the heating system temperature is increased by this value.
data_description.wda_humidity_correction: For every 1% humidity above 50%, the heating system temperature is increased by this value
data_description.wda_update_interval: Used for a separate sensor that is updated periodically to reduce the frequency of change the target coolant temperature to your equipment.

error.exp_min_must_be_less: The min. exponent must be less than the max. exponent.
error.wda_exp_min.exp_min_must_be_less: The min. exponent must be less than the max. exponent.
